Class Giant

java.lang.Object
Creature
Giant
public class Giant extends Creature
Giant is a child class of creature. Giant also happens to be the super class to the following classes HillG, MossG, and Jairon. Giant has a 15% chance to land a crit. Superclasses such as this and Demon do not have to have override methods for names.
Version:
2024.11.15
Author:
Don Santiago
